Package org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.business.base

Class SuperServiceTest<DTO extends SuperDto,S extends SuperService<?,DTO,? extends SuperRepository<?>,? extends SuperMapper<DTO,?>>>

java.lang.Object
org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.base.AbstractWireMockGameServiceToFastApiTest
org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.business.base.SuperServiceTest<DTO,S>
Type Parameters:
DTO - the type of the Data Transfer Object
S - the type of the service being tested
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthorServiceTest, AvisServiceTest, CategoryServiceTest, GameServiceTest, InventoryServiceTest, PublisherServiceTest, PurchaseLineServiceTest, PurchaseServiceTest, UserServiceTest, WishlistServiceTest
public abstract class SuperServiceTest<DTO extends SuperDto,S extends SuperService<?,DTO,? extends SuperRepository<?>,? extends SuperMapper<DTO,?>>> extends AbstractWireMockGameServiceToFastApiTest
Abstract base class for service layer integration tests.

This class provides reusable test methods for verifying the behavior of service classes that extend SuperService. It supports generic DTOs, services, repositories, and mappers.
